participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and caring, with a love for music and animals.
participant_1.background: I love beef. I am in a very intimate and loving relationship. I have a dog that has behavioral issues. I enjoy playing guitar and video games. I work from home doing various jobs on the internet.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Humorous and introspective, often using humor to cope with challenges.
participant_2.background: My biggest fear in life is heights. I can make fart noises with my armpits, even some musical melody. I have been cheated on by every ex-girlfriend except for one. There has only been one set of twins in my family.
